com.vernalis.pdbconnector2.query.text.fields

Class QueryFieldString

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vernalis.pdbconnector2.query.text.fields.QueryField
      • com.vernalis.pdbconnector2.query.text.fields.QueryFieldString
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<QueryField>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    QueryFieldSuggester

    public class QueryFieldString
extends QueryField
    A query field for a free-text input. This may be a single value, or multiple values in an editable table
    Since:
    1.28.0
    Author:
    S.Roughley knime@vernalis.com
    See Also:
    QueryFieldSuggester

        displayName - The display name

        placeholder - The optiona placeholder

      • calculateComponentSize

        protected int calculateComponentSize(org.knime.core.node.defaultnodesettings.SettingsModelString stringModel)
        Parameters:
        stringModel - The Settings Model containing the field value
        Returns:
        An appropriate width for the component, which will be the default if the model contains null or an empty string, the length of the string if it between MIN_FIELD_WIDTH and MAX_FIELD_WIDTH, and the appropriate one of those bounds if it is beyond them
